audit.title: Agent Service Backend Verification
audit.summary: 50/51 agents have real execute() implementations with working backend services. 1 agent (SUBSCRIPTION_SPECIALIST) has a deleted file. AGENT_REGISTRY.json should be corrected.

missing_agents.reason: File deleted — subscription features temporarily disabled
missing_agents.impact: Subscription lifecycle (billing cycles, dunning, state transitions) is non-operational
